description: Enterprise techniques used by HyperStack, ATT&CK software S0537 v1.0
name: HyperStack (S0537)

techniques.comment: [HyperStack](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0537) can enumerate all account names on a remote share.(Citation: Accenture HyperStack October 2020)
[HyperStack](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0537) has used RSA encryption for C2 communications.(Citation: Accenture HyperStack October 2020)
[HyperStack](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0537) can connect to the IPC$ share on remote machines.(Citation: Accenture HyperStack October 2020)

[HyperStack](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0537) can add the name of its communication pipe to HKLM\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\lanmanserver\\parameters\NullSessionPipes.(Citation: Accenture HyperStack October 2020)

[HyperStack](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0537) can use Windows API's ConnectNamedPipe and WNetAddConnection2 to detect incoming connections and connect to remote shares.(Citation: Accenture HyperStack October 2020)
[HyperStack](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0537) can use default credentials to connect to IPC$ shares on remote machines.(Citation: Accenture HyperStack October 2020)
